original_text: Moses did as the Lord commanded him. He took Joshua and had him stand before Eleazar the priest and the whole assembly.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 대로 하여 여호수아를 데려다가 제사장 엘르아살과 온 회중 앞에 세우고

sentences.original_text: Moses did as the Lord commanded him.
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 주께서 그에게 명령하신 대로 행하였다.

sentences.original_text: and had him stand before Eleazar the priest
